participant_1.name: Alexander
participant_1.personality: Ambitious, confident, and somewhat aloof, he often comes off as assertive and driven.
participant_1.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i grew up in manhattan. i plan to go to business school next year.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Creative, friendly, and nurturing, she finds joy in teaching and expressing herself through photography.
participant_2.background: i am fluent in english spanish and french. my favorite colors are red and silver. i'm interested in photography and like taking pictures. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. i'm an elementary school teacher.
